"Nameless City Residential Area":
"We are forming a special team to investigate the situation in the mysterious city complex known as the Nameless City. Given the circumstances, we are aiming to keep operative fatigue to a minimum, so the team will be operating in very short shifts. All those who are confident in their skills should join the investigation team.
――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――
※Exploration Points are halved on incapacitation"
